name: battleship-online
description: A website dedicated to the game of Battleship

scripts.preinstall: cd ./client && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../server && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.install: cd ./client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.build: cd ./client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd ./server && npm run dev" "cd ./client && npm run dev"

author: Jeff Talada
